scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run compile
scripts.deploy: yarn inject-env && node .build/deployer-cli.js deploy -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.remove-airnode: yarn inject-env && node .build/deployer-cli.js remove-airnode -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.remove-mnemonic: yarn inject-env && node .build/deployer-cli.js remove-mnemonic -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.sls:config: yarn inject-env && sls config credentials --provider aws --key $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --secret $AWS_SECRET_KEY
